channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Monhole covers, 31st January
item.description:
When people drive over the manhole covers they are extremely noisy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Greenways, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Footpath damage outside 72 Church Road.

item.title: Traffic lights not working, 31st January
item.description:
Temporary lights for pedestrian crossing near GCHQ are not working. No lights shown at all for the last 5-7 days
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hubble Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter all over the street, footpaths and grass verges, 31st January
item.description:
Looks like a complete mess, every few yards there is litter from the shop or nearby shops.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Rowanfield Exchange Devon Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shared path in appalling condition, 30th January
item.description:
Broken tarmac, roots growing through and badly maintained signage... Not great for any mode of transport, walking, cycling or mobility scooter! Incredibly wide road nearby
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 80 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Potholes

item.title: Under counter fridge, 30th January
item.description:
Needs removing from No 19, had to be taken off the pavement as it was causing an obstruction,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62 Kempton Grove, Cheltenham

item.title: Parking on ZigZags, 30th January
item.description:
Repeated parking on zigzags outside Castle Hill School. Parking opposite driveways and blocking exit. Zig zags have faded considerably.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Castle Hill Drive, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip Hazard Water Stoptaps, 29th January
item.description:
Over time the paving/infill around this pair of STW stop tap covers has sunk, or otherwise eroded to the point where they now present a tripping hazard. Location: on the pavement/footpath outside nos. 99 and 101 Ashlands Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 97 Ashlands Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 29th January
item.description:
Multiple potholes St Paul’s Road Cheltenham junction with Dunalley St and Marle Hill Parade including a very deep one

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5b Dunalley Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole St Paul’s Road Cheltenham, 29th January
item.description:
Pothole in road outside 23 St Paul’s Road, Cheltenham Approx 1 ft across, over an inch deep

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Litter and dog fouling, 29th January
item.description:
This lane is full of rubbish. The latest thing is dumping poo bags in trees. Please can it be cleaned and a patrol put in place? This is really putting me off coming here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 38 Everest Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dumped, 29th January
item.description:
Litter dumped on verge

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Everest Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole in Pavement, 29th January
item.description:
Hole in Pavement on Melville Road outside number 9. It is adjacent to a Severn Trent water stop tap cover. Hole is at least 4inches deep

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Melville Road, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty Pedestrian Traffic island markers, 29th January
item.description:
Reflective markers on main road traffic crossings for pedestrians are so dirty that they can’t be seen. Witnessed cars almost hit them. Dangerous for cars but especially pedestrians in poor weather/dark conditions. Need cleaning urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Patch Gotherington Fields, Gotherington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): West Drive, Cheltenham
